TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit VisualStyleElement/ExplorerBar/HeaderClose extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Provides objects for each state of the **Close** button of the Explorer Bar. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Each property of the VisualStyleElement.ExplorerBar.HeaderClose class returns a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> for a different state of the **Close** button of the Explorer Bar.
## Examples The following code example demonstrates how to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer> with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.ExplorerBar.HeaderClose.Normal%2A> property. To run this example, paste it into a Windows Form. Handle the form’s <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event and call the `DrawVisualStyleElementExplorerBarHeaderClose1` method from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event-handling method, passing `e` as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.
[!code-cs[System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples#138](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.windows.forms.v_71_1.cs)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples#138](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.windows.forms.v_71_1.vb)]

Docs.summary: Gets a visual style element that represents a **Close** button in the hot state.
Docs.value: A that represents a **Close** button in the hot state.

remarks.format:
## Remarks You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> returned by the Hot property to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer>.
## Examples The following code example demonstrates how to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer> with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> returned by the Hot property. To run this example, paste it into a Windows Form. Handle the form’s <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event and call the `DrawVisualStyleElementExplorerBarHeaderClose2` method from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event-handling method, passing `e` as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.
[!code-cs[System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples#139](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/4c5f41ab-19d0-4de4-a294-_1.cs)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples#139](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/4c5f41ab-19d0-4de4-a294-_1.vb)]

Docs.summary: Gets a visual style element that represents a **Close** button in the normal state.
Docs.value: A that represents a **Close** button in the normal state.

remarks.format:
## Remarks You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> returned by the Normal property to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer>.
## Examples The following code example demonstrates how to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer> with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> returned by the Normal property. To run this example, paste it into a Windows Form. Handle the form’s <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event and call the `DrawVisualStyleElementExplorerBarHeaderClose1` method from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event-handling method, passing `e` as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.
[!code-cs[System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples#138](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/63b4fb94-45a4-424d-9635-_1.cs)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples#138](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/63b4fb94-45a4-424d-9635-_1.vb)]

Docs.summary: Gets a visual style element that represents a **Close** button in the pressed state.
Docs.value: A that represents a **Close** button in the pressed state.

remarks.format:
## Remarks You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> returned by the Pressed property to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer>.
## Examples The following code example demonstrates how to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer> with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> returned by the Pressed property. To run this example, paste it into a Windows Form. Handle the form’s <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event and call the `DrawVisualStyleElementExplorerBarHeaderClose3` method from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event-handling method, passing `e` as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.
